requestBody.description: Optional redirect URI to append to the hosted ToS acceptance link

parameters.name: X-Pubkey
parameters.description: Integrator's ECDSA public key (P-256 curve, compressed SEC1 format). Example: 0x038fedef7c12f93bbf342ad8943b7a825a3b41f61c9dc118b2c718efebabbf62fd

parameters.name: X-Timestamp
parameters.description: Unix timestamp in seconds (UTC). Must be within tolerance window (1 minute) to prevent replay attacks. Example: 1760375826

parameters.name: X-Signature
parameters.description: ECDSA signature (DER-encoded, hex with 0x prefix). Signs the message: {timestamp}{METHOD}{path_and_query}{json_body}. Example: 0x3045022100...

parameters.name: X-Pubkey
parameters.description: Integrator's ECDSA public key (P-256 curve, compressed SEC1 format). Example: 0x038fedef7c12f93bbf342ad8943b7a825a3b41f61c9dc118b2c718efebabbf62fd

parameters.name: X-Timestamp
parameters.description: Unix timestamp in seconds (UTC). Must be within tolerance window (1 minute) to prevent replay attacks. Example: 1760375826

parameters.name: X-Signature
parameters.description: ECDSA signature (DER-encoded, hex with 0x prefix). Signs the message: {timestamp}{METHOD}{path_and_query}{json_body}. Example: 0x3045022100...

get.description: Returns a list of all Byzantine vaults from configuration. "Vaults" are deposit products, the main entities in the Byzantine protocol.

200.description: List of top vaults retrieved successfully

get.description: Returns the health status of the API

AdditionalUserInfo.description: Additional user information for KYC. This information is required for users considered high risk or over 60 years of age.

mostRecentOccupation.description:
Most recent occupation of the user. Required for high risk users.
Must be a valid six-digit occupation code. See the full list of [occupation codes](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/lists/occupation-codes).

Address.description: Address information. Must be a valid address in the relevant country.

streetLine2.description: Optional additional details to the street name and number.

state.description: Required for US addresses. Should be a valid ISO 3166-2 subdivision code.

vaultAddr.description: The address of the vault to approve.

AssociatedPerson.description: Associated person (beneficiary or representative). Must be at least one.

isOrgAdmin.description: Set to `true` if this person should be an active controller of the account. At least one org_admin is required.

AssociatedPersonResponse.description: Response body for an associated person

isOrgAdmin.description: Set to `true` if this person should be an active controller of the account. At least one org_admin is required.

isPasskeyActivated.description: An indicator showing whether passkey authentication is active for this user. For more information, see [wallet authentication](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/wallet-authentication).

isOtpActivated.description: An indicator showing whether OTP authentication is active for this user. For more information, see [wallet authentication](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/wallet-authentication).

credentialId.description: The cbor encoded then base64 url encoded id of the credential.

clientDataJson.description: A base64 url encoded payload containing metadata about the signing context and the challenge.

attestationObject.description: A base64 url encoded payload containing authenticator data and any attestation the webauthn provider chooses.

title.description: Required for representatives. The title held at the business.

ownershipPercentage.description: Required for UBOs. The % of direct or indirect business ownership.

BeneficiaryType.description:
Beneficiary type.

UBOs are any individuals who, directly or inderectly, own more than 25% of the business.

Representatives are individuals who have direct control over daily operations.

BigDecimal.description: A decimal number represented as a string

BusinessActivityInfo.description: Information about business activities. This is required for high-risk businesses. Filling it wholly can accelerate the KYB process.

operatesInProhibitedCountries.description: Must be set to `true` if the business has any activity in or relation to Cuba, Iran, Myanmar, North Korea, or Syria.

highRiskActivitiesExplanation.description: Required if high_risk_activities is anything other than none_of_the_above or empty. A short description to explain the business' involvement with the declared high-risk activities.
highRiskActivitiesExplanation.example: As a jewelry shop, we deal with precious stones.

conductsMoneyServices.description: Must be set to `true` if the business offers money services, investment products, and/or other financial services.

conductsMoneyServicesDescription.description: Required if conducts_money_services is true. A short description to explain the business' money services. Should include a detailed description of the business's compliance and anti-money laundering controls and practices.

BusinessType.description: Business legal form. Select that most appropriate one fitting your jurisdiction.

CountryCode.description: The ISO 3166-1 (three-character) country code of the relevant country. See the full list of [countries](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/lists/countries).

CreateEntityRequest.description: Request body for creating a Byzantine entity

bridgeSignedAgreementId.description: The ID of the signed Bridge ToS agreement. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

byzantineTermsSignedAt.description: The timestamp when the Byzantine Finance Terms & Conditions were signed. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

CreateEntityResponse.description: Response body for creating a Byzantine entity

bridgeSignedAgreementId.description: The ID of the signed Bridge ToS agreement. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

byzantineTermsSignedAt.description: The timestamp when the Byzantine Finance Terms & Conditions were signed. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

CreateUserRequest.description: User to be created. The vast majority of fields are required in order to complete the identity verification process.

bridgeSignedAgreementId.description: The ID of the signed Bridge ToS agreement. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

byzantineTermsSignedAt.description: The timestamp when the Byzantine Finance Terms & Conditions were signed. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

CreateUserResponse.description: Response body for creating a Byzantine user

bridgeSignedAgreementId.description: The ID of the signed Bridge ToS agreement. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

byzantineTermsSignedAt.description: The timestamp when the Byzantine Finance Terms & Conditions were signed. For more information, see [individual account creation - KYC](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/kyc).

isPasskeyActivated.description: An indicator showing whether passkey authentication is active for this user. For more information, see [wallet authentication](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/wallet-authentication).

isOtpActivated.description: An indicator showing whether OTP authentication is active for this user. For more information, see [wallet authentication](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/wallet-authentication).

Decimal.description: A high-precision decimal number represented as a string

DepositRequestBody.description: The legal name of the business

vaultAddr.description: The address of the vault to deposit into.

EmploymentStatus.description: Employment status of a user. Required for high risk users.

EntityDocumentType.description: Entity document type. For a full list of accepted document types, see [accepted documents](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/documents).

businessLegalName.description: The legal name of the business.

businessTradeName.description: The trade name of the business. Can be the same as the entity name, but must be submitted.

businessIndustry.description: A valid 6-digit NAICS industry code. See the full list of [industry codes](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/lists/industry-codes).

companyNumber.description: The registered business number. Depending on the country of registration, we accept these [entity number types](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/lists/company-number-types).

hasMaterialIntermediaryEntityOwner.description: true if there is another legal entity that owns 25% or more of the business

EntityVerificationDocument.description: Entity verification document object. For a full list of required documents, see [accepted documents](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/documents).

description.description: A description of the document. Must be submitted if document if os type `other`.
description.example: An overview of our business activities.

document.description:
The document to be uploaded.

Supported MIME types: image/jpeg, image/png, image/heic, image/tiff, application/pdf

EstimatedAnnualRevenue.description: Estimated annual business revenue in USD, defined as a range.

ExpectedMonthlyPayments.description: Expected monthly payments in USD. Required for high risk users.

redirectUri.description: Optional redirect URI to append to the hosted URL returned by Bridge

GetTransactionResponse.description: Response for getting a single transaction by ID

HighRiskActivity.description: High risk business activities. Must be declared if the business is engaged in any.

NaiveDateTime.description: A naive datetime string without timezone

otpCode.description: The OTp code that the user received via email.

webAuthnStamp.description: Cryptographically signed (stamped) request to be passed in as a header. For more info, see [wallet authentication](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/wallet-authentication).

broadcastedAt.description: Exact timestamp when the transaction was broadcasted on-chain. Only available for `completed` transactions.

SignTransactionParams.description: The parameters object containing the specific intent data for this transaction.

signWith.description: A Wallet account address, Private Key address, or Private Key identifier.

unsignedTransaction.description: Raw unsigned transaction to be signed.

SignTransactionRequest.description: The object that needs to be signed by the end user to make a transaction.

timestampMs.description: UNIX timestamp of the creation of the transaction.

organizationId.description: The account ID making the transaction.

bank_name.description: The name of the beneficiary bank.

bank_address.description: The address of the beneficiary bank.

bank_beneficiary_name.description: The name of the beneficiary. Either first and last name, or a business name.

bank_account_number.description: In case of a USD deposit, the bank account number to deposit to.

bank_routing_number.description: In case of a USD deposit, the ban routing number to deposit to.

iban_number.description: In case of a EUR deposit, the IBAN to deposit to.

iban_bic.description: In case of a EUR deposit, the BIC to deposit to.

TransactionStatus.description: The current status of the transaction.

TransactionType.description: Type of transaction that is being submitted.

UserDocumentType.description: Type of the document. See the full list of [accepted documents](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/documents).

UserInfo.description: Personal information about the user required for identity verification.

socialSecurityNumber.description: Required exclusively for USA-based users. Must be the full social security number.

UserSourceOfFunds.description: Source of funds for users. Required for high risk users.

UserVerificationDocument.description: Document(s) to verify the identity of the user.

documentNumber.description: Required for identity documents (passport, national ID). Must be the full document number.

document.description:
The document to be uploaded.

Supported MIME types: image/jpeg, image/png, image/heic, image/tiff, application/pdf

currentBalanceShares.description: Current balance in shares after this transaction

ratio.description: Share to asset ratio (last share price)

lastUpdateTxHash.description: Hash of the last update transaction

lastUpdateTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the last update in milliseconds

transactions.description: List of transactions for this vault

documentNumber.description: The full document number sent with the document.

issuingCountry.description: The ISO 3166-1 (three-character) country code of the relevant country. See the full list of [countries](https://docs.byzantine.fi/api-reference/lists/countries).

documentId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the document.

VerificationStatus.description: The identity verification status of the user.

vaultAddr.description: The address of the vault to withdraw from.
